title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up
descriptions:
Introducing the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game, the perfect game for an exciting and fun-filled family night! This game is suitable for kids aged 8 and up, making it a great choice for both children and parents to enjoy together.

With its fast-paced gameplay, this Family Board Game will keep you on your toes from start to finish. The objective is simple: guess words without saying the forbidden words! The game includes two decks of cards, one for the kids and one for the adults, ensuring that everyone can participate and have a blast.

The kids' deck features familiar guess words, while the adult deck offers a varied selection of over 1,000 guess words. Each card in the kids' deck has two forbidden words, adding an extra challenge to the game. The adult deck, on the other hand, has standard forbidden words that players must avoid.

With a total of 260 cards in the game, you'll have plenty of opportunities to show off your guessing skills. Each age group has their own deck of 130 cards, ensuring a fair and balanced gameplay experience. And don't forget about the exciting game components included - a squeaker to add some fun and a one-minute timer to keep the game moving at a lively pace.

The winning condition is simple: the team with the most points takes home the victory! But be careful, saying forbidden words will result in a point for the opposing team, so choose your words wisely.

Manufactured by the trusted brand Hasbro, you can expect high-quality and durable game components that will withstand countless hours of family fun. So gather your loved ones, prepare for some friendly competition, and get ready to create unforgettable memories with the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game!

Introducing the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game, the ultimate game night experience for ages 8 and up! 

This fast-paced and exciting family board game is designed to bring out the competitive spirit in both kids and parents. With its Kids vs. Parents edition, it's time to settle the age-old debate of who knows more in your household.

The game includes two decks of cards, totaling 260 cards, ensuring hours of endless fun. The Kids deck features familiar guess words, while the Adult deck offers varied and challenging options for over 1,000 guess words. But beware! Each card also contains forbidden words that you must avoid saying while trying to get your teammates to guess the word.

To add to the excitement, the game comes with a one-minute timer, keeping the rounds fast-paced and intense. And yes, there's even a squeaker included for those hilarious moments that will have everyone laughing!

The objective of the game is simple: guess as many words as possible without saying any forbidden words. But be careful - if you slip up, your opponent gets the point! The winning team is determined by the most points earned, so strategize, communicate, and outsmart your opponents to claim victory.

Manufactured by the renowned Hasbro brand, you can trust in the quality and durability of this game. It's perfect for family gatherings, game nights, and even parties with friends.

Don't miss out on the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game. Get ready for endless laughter, friendly competition, and unforgettable moments. Buy now and create lasting memories with your loved ones!
